author: Fahad Jafri
text: Just because i waited for this spotted owlet for a couple of hours in the midst of nowhere and the weather was complete disaster. https://t.co/zLz68Gn5tT https://t.co/rY9lKWy6sR

author: Fahad Jafri
text: On a trek in india. Wildlife surprises you and you see yourself hung on a brach of a tree sheltering yourself with leaves and hiding yourself from an amazingly ferocious leopard. It was a lucky shot though and still proud for the courage. 😅 https://t.co/mMui8IP1rr https://t.co/A4YtCry1JH

author: Fahad Jafri
text:
Be more human. 

At least try a bit.. 
it won’t take much of your valuable time.. just your heart in the right place with the right people. It might help your soul helping a needy rather insulting other community people or anyone for that matter. Just contribute some good. 🙏🏻

author: Fahad Jafri
text:
“The world won’t be destroyed by those who do evil but rather by those who watch them without doing  nothing.”
- #AlbertEinstein
